page.title: 10RELIGION West Cambs.
page.content:
Brington, Catworth and Leighton Broms- wold all still have Parish Churches though with small congregations. Rector at Brington also has care of Leighton Bromswold, Catworth is one of 7 parishes centred on Kimbolton.
All Non-conformist chapels now closed. Worshippers go to Old Weston Methodist
Brington - no chapel known
Catworth - Baptist, Church Lane (pulled down 1940s); Wesleyan Method- ist, High Street (Raunds Circuit) closed 1980s, now house conversion
Leighton Bromswold - Wesleyan Method- ist closed 1970s, now private house
Nearest Catholic Church St. Hughs, Buckden Towers.
